Access Essential Training and Support Free Consultation Get SAP Software to Enhance Your Business Learn How to Choose and Implement the Right Solution REQUEST MY CONSULTATION NOW What is ERP software for accounting? ERP software for accounting (Enterprise Resource Planning) integrates and automates various financial and accounting processes within an organization. It provides a centralized system for managing economic activities, including general ledger, accounts payable and receivable, financial reporting, budgeting, tax management, fixed assets, and cash management. ERP software for accounting enables businesses to streamline and standardize their accounting processes, increase efficiency, reduce manual errors, and improve financial visibility and control. It allows for real-time tracking and analysis of financial data, facilitating informed decision-making. Additionally, it often includes features for compliance with accounting regulations and standards. Overall, ERP software for accounting serves as a comprehensive tool to manage and organize financial operations, providing a holistic view of an organization's financial health. Best ERP Systems SAP ERP Oracle ERP Cloud Microsoft Dynamics 365 What is ERP software, and how does it differ from traditional accounting software? 1. Scope 2. Integration 3. Scalability 4. observation: Privacy Policy | Accounting Micro System  Sales | Support Software SAP Business ByDesign SAP Business One SAP Analytics Cloud Industries Non-Profit Organizations Professional Services Distributors Services Implementation Custom Software Development Integration Services Company Contact Us Blog call us (888)806-0956 SAP Concur Manufacturing AMS Privacy Policy Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this policy in order for you to understand how we collect, communicate and make use of personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy: When accessing the www.accountingmicro.com website, Accounting Micro Systems will learn certain information about you during your visit. Similar to other commercial websites, our website utilizes a standard technology called ‘cookies’ (see explanation below) and server logs to collect information about how our site is used. Information gathered through cookies and server logs may include the date and time of visits, the pages viewed, time spent at our site, and the websites visited just before and just after our own, as well as your IP address. Use of Cookies A cookie is a very small text document, which often includes an anonymous unique identifier. When you visit a website, that site’s computer asks your computer for permission to store this file in a part of your hard drive specifically designated for cookies. Each website can send its own cookie to your browser if your browser’s preferences allow it, but (to protect your privacy) your browser only permits a website to access the cookies it has already sent to you, not the cookies sent to you by other sites. IP Addresses Email Information How Do We Use the Information That You Provide to Us? CAN-SPAM Compliance Choice/Opt-Out You must not: Republish material from our website without prior written consent. Sell or rent material from our website. Reproduce, duplicate, create derivative, copy or otherwise exploit material on our website for any purpose. In accordance with the FTC guidelines concerning the use of endorsements and testimonials in advertising, please be aware of the following: How Do We Protect Your Information and Secure Information Transmissions? www.accountingmicro.com Accounting Micro Systems 72 22nd Ave 888.806.0956 sales@accountingmicro.com ©2018 Accounting Micro Systems.
